name: Chaotic Carrier
description:
Chaotic Carrier

You are a postal carrier in a busy city. You must deliver packages all over the city, while trying to keep your van in good condition.

How many packages can you deliver on time!

Controls:

recommend using a controller.

Accelerate    -     w / up arrow 

Turn Left        -      A / left arrow

 Turn right       -     D / right arrow
